subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: new to group, questions
author: Misty Dawn
full_text:
Mikes youtube videos can be seen here

http://www.youtube.com/profile?user=UFOGeek&view=videos

He has quite alot of them up now (more than last time I went, good job Mike). He has always posted them freely and shares his research with others. He also posts alot on his websites.

http://www.ufogeek.com/
http://www.ufomagazine.net/


Misty


--- On Tue, 12/23/08, shortbuff <rdmc512@...> wrote:

> From: shortbuff <rdmc512@...>
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: new to group, questions
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Date: Tuesday, December 23, 2008, 12:59 AM
> Hi Mike, Is this going to be something you sell or something
> that can
> be seen on youtube or some other place?
> 
> What Youtube videos of yours can i see now? 
> 
> Thanks,
> 
> Richard
> 
> 
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "M.A. Coletta
> (Mike)"
> <michaelcoletta@...> wrote:
> >
> > Richard, Misty, and all other fellow researchers,
> > 
> > This is a fasinating topic, one that I am currently
> most interested 
> > with as my latest experiment/research project is all
> about.
> > The crash debris that was sent to 8 researchers, I
> believe, does hold 
> > imprints from a violent past.
> > As does the area where the original crash happened,
> since there are 
> > still amounts of debris scattered around the immediate
> area, as well 
> > as beneath the surface where now stands a memorial. 
> Not to mention 
> > it is the last place where living humans were quickly
> lost.  Just 
> > imagine the amount of energy that must be imprinted on
> that exact 
> > spot.
> > 
> > That is where I hoped to gain a better understanding
> of that energy 
> > which is imprinted... and I must say, I think I have
> done just that.
> > 
> > Today I processed a number of the files I captured
> from the impact 
> > point using numerous devices of the non-microphone
> type.  After I put 
> > each of these files through a four step process (which
> I'll explain 
> > in great detail in my video), I was able to listen to
> some amazing, 
> > and very relivent sounds.
> > My wife was so upset after I told her what I had
> heard, she refused 
> > to listen to the audio.
> > 
> > Let me just say... the combination I used was able to
> capture a very 
> > chilling scene.  One I just have to believe were the
> last moments of 
> > those who perished.
> > 
> > Once I publish the final results, I hope others will
> be able to 
> > verify what I am hearing...
> > 
> > I'm figuring to put a multi-part video on my
> Youtube page.  One part 
> > explaining what will be seen an heard, as well as
> describing the 
> > events of that day.  Another part with my sessions at
> the various 
> > locations, using various methods.  And a final part
> with the audio of 
> > the researchers who assisted with this experiment
> using the debris I 
> > sent each of them.
> > 
> > Bottom line... I really do believe that energy is
> imprinted in 
> > objects, and at locations where energy was strong at a
> time of 
> > imprint.
> > 
> > Happy Holidays to all.... have a safe and fun Holiday
> Season!
> > 
> > - Mike C. (UFO Geek)
> > 
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty"
> <bulletbabea@> wrote:
> > >
> > > Richard,
> > > 
> > > Thats a great example and a good way to look at
> things. the old 
> > idea 
> > > that energy doesnt die its just transformed holds
> true with that 
> > too. 
> > > I have seen the same thing done with missing
> appendages, tho a 
> > finger 
> > > may have been removed it still registers under
> kirlian photography 
> > as 
> > > its energy being present.
> > > 
> > > Just because we dont see something or hear a
> thing doesnt mean it 
> > is 
> > > nonexistant =) Perhaps it just means we are deaf
> and blind to its 
> > > existence.
> > > 
> > > Misty
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com,
> "shortbuff" <rdmc512@> wrote:
> > > >
> > > > Thanks for replying to my message.
> > > > 
> > > > Years ago I watched a slide show featuring
> several photo's taken 
> > via
> > > > kirlian photography. It seems kirlian
> photography captures certain
> > > > types of energy on film. In the
> demonstration a picture of a 
> > house 
> > > was
> > > > shown. Later that same house had a fire and
> part of the house had 
> > > been
> > > > burned to the ground but the photo taken
> with kirlian photography
> > > > later showed that part of the house still
> there.
> > > > 
> > > > I'm no expert but maybe energy we
> can't see leaves an imprint in 
> > the
> > > > non physical universe and can be viewed or
> demonstrated using the
> > > > right instruments and technique. Of course I
> really have no clue 
> > and
> > > > am fascinated by the evp and itc phenomena.
> > > > 
> > > > Enjoyed visiting your site, thanks for the
> link.
> > > > 
> > > > Richard
> >
